displayName.text: Exotic Car Rental NYC | Luxury Car Rental

formattedAddress: 220 E 9th St, New York, NY 10003, USA
adrFormatAddress: 220 E 9th St, New York, NY 10003-7585, USA

originalText.text: We have rented from many different car rental companies and this company has always been the absolute best. They offer an impeccable service, never get in any accidents, and have always gotten me to my destination on time. The cars are like new and are extremely affordable. I would highly recommend this company to anyone!

originalText.text: For my husband's birthday celebration, I leased a Lamborghini, and it was a huge success. Originally, I wanted to hire a Mercedes, but the service was so good that I opted to continue with the company. The automobile was delivered on schedule with no problems. There is a lot of value for the money spent on them.

originalText.text: I rented a sport car from this business and it was never so easy. I got the car I wanted with no trouble and the staff were very helpful. The rates were also great - much better than my usual partner!

originalText.text: This is a good car rental service, they do have high quality cars. They recommend you exactly the car to rent and give you many features on their website. I have rented 4 cars from them and I'm satisfied with all of them except the one time, which was because of the weather conditions.

originalText.text: I need to get a car to cross the state as I start my vacation. I've never rented a place before, so I don't know what to anticipate. It's stressful, but so far with this business, everything is going well! They provide excellent customer service and have in-depth knowledge of the rental cars.
